'''Crow's Nest''' is a castle in [[the Stormlands]], the region controlled by [[House Baratheon]] of [[Storm's End]]. The castle is located in a wooded area east of [[Blackhaven]].<ref>[[The Wolf and the Lion]]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Crow's Nest is the seat of House Morrigen.
